summary: The plants overview covers resources focused on environmental stewardship, symbiotic relationships, and self-awareness. The notable course, Groom Your Ecosystem, teaches tasks such as taking care of a garden, learning from animals, and enhancing communication skills. This enables impactful leadership and creative expression aligned with personal values.
excerpt: Groom Your Ecosystem includes tasks like learning from animals, fostering self-awareness, and promoting environmental stewardship. It enhances communication, leadership, and creative expression.
